TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailMessage extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示可以使用 类发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Represents an email message that can be sent using the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类用于构造电子邮件消息传输到 SMTP 服务器以便传递使用类。Instances of the class are used to construct email messages that are transmitted to an SMTP server for delivery using the class. 可以将发件人、 收件人、 主题和电子邮件的正文指定为参数时用来初始化对象。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 这些参数还可以设置或在使用属性访问对象。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 可能使用的以下属性将设置主邮件消息标头和消息元素类。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |邮件标头或部分Mail header or part|PropertyProperty| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件抄送 (BCC)Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |副本 (CC)Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |编码为自定义标头Encoding for custom headers|| |消息正文Message body|| |优先级Priority|| |接收方Recipient|| |回复Reply-To|| |发件人Sender|| |SubjectSubject|| 类还允许应用程序访问的消息使用的标头集合属性。The class also allows an application to access the headers collection for the message using the property. 虽然此集合是只读的 （新的集合不能设置），自定义标头可以添加到或从该集合中删除。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 添加任何自定义标头将包含何时发送实例。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 仅标头发送一条消息之前，特别是添加到此集合中属性包含在集合中。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 之后发送实例，属性还将包括使用关联的属性的设置的标头类或参数时传递用于初始化对象。After a the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些邮件标头格式不正确，它们可能导致损坏的电子邮件消息。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此任何邮件标头中可以使用属性上设置的标头集合类仅应设置为使用类属性或作为参数传递时初始化对象。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 不应使用添加以下邮件标头列表属性，并且任何值设置为使用这些标头属性将被放弃或覆盖发送消息时：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - 密件抄送Bcc - CcCc - 内容 IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - FromFrom - 重要性Importance - MIME 版本MIME-Version - 优先级Priority - 回复Reply-To - 发件人Sender - 到To - X 优先级X-Priority 如果应用程序未指定标头使用 X 发件人属性，类发送消息时将创建一个。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 使用属性以不同的格式指定电子邮件的副本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果您以 html 格式发送一条消息，您可能还要提供纯文本版本，以防某些收件人使用的电子邮件阅读程序不能显示 HTML 内容。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 有关演示如何创建一条消息的可选视图的示例，请参阅。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with alternate views, see . 使用属性添加到电子邮件的附件。Use the property to add attachments to an email message. 有关演示如何创建一条消息带有附件的示例，请参阅。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with an attachment, see . 组装你的电子邮件之后, 可以发送该邮件通过或方法。After assembling your email message, you can send it by using the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送包含附件的电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message that includes an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

summary.span: 获取用于存储邮件正文的替代形式的附件集合。

span.span: Gets the attachment collection used to store alternate forms of the message body.
A writable .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以不同的格式指定电子邮件的副本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果您以 html 格式发送一条消息，您可能还要提供纯文本版本，以防某些收件人使用的电子邮件阅读程序不能显示 HTML 内容。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 若要添加到另一种视图对象，请创建视图，然后将其添加到返回的集合。To add an alternate view to a object, create an for the view, and then add it to the collection returned by . 使用属性来指定文本版本和使用集合，以指定视图与其他 MIME 类型。Use the property to specify the text version and use the collection to specify views with other MIME types. 使用类成员，可以指定替代视图的 MIME 类型。Use the class members to specify the MIME type for the alternate view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送电子邮件使用纯文本和 HTML 替代视图。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with a plain text and an HTML alternate view. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用返回的集合属性来添加附件，如文件或的内容，对此。Use the collection returned by the property to add an attachment, such as a file or the contents of a , to this . 创建，包含或引用数据附加，，然后添加返回的集合到。Create an that contains or references the data to be attached, and then add the to the collection returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送带有附件的电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Body { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Body : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置邮件正文。

span.span: Gets or sets the message body.
A value that contains the body text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的内容为"text/plain"。The of the content is "text/plain". 指定用于与正文的编码属性。Specify the encoding used for the body with the property. 如果其他格式可提供更丰富的演示文稿选项，以便收件人正文内容，您可以使用指定的正文内容的备用视图属性。If the body content is available in alternative formats that provide richer presentation options for the recipients, you can specify alternate views for the body content by using the property. 例如，应用程序可以选择发送纯文本正文和消息正文的 HTML 版本。For example, an application might choose to send both the plain text body and an HTML version of the message body. 可以显示 HTML 的电子邮件读取器可以向正文的 HTML 版本接收方，而不能显示 HTML 的读取器将显示该消息的纯文本版本改为。Email readers that can display HTML can present the HTML version of the body to the recipient, while readers that cannot display HTML will display the plain text version of the message instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#2)]

An applied to the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的值属性的字符组字段设置的内容类型标头。The value specified for the property sets the character set field in the Content-Type header. 默认的字符集是`"us-ascii"`。The default character set is `"us-ascii"`. 如果您设置属性设置为， ，或，则框架将选择的此。If you set the property to , , or , the Framework selects a of for this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用 UTF8 编码的邮件消息。The following code example demonstrates creating a mail message that uses UTF8 encoding. [!code-cpp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/cpp/mailasync.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/CS/mailasync.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/vb/mailasync.vb#3)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 后调用 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何释放。The following code example demonstrates disposing a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Gets the email headers that are transmitted with this email message.

value.span: 一个，其中包含电子邮件标头。

span.span: A that contains the email headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许应用程序访问消息的标头集合。The property allows an application to access the headers collection for the message. 虽然此集合是只读的 （新的集合不能设置），自定义标头可以添加到或从该集合中删除。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 添加任何自定义标头将包含何时发送实例。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 仅标头发送一条消息之前，特别是添加到此集合中属性包含在集合中。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 之后发送实例，属性还将包括使用关联的属性的设置的标头类或参数时传递用于初始化对象。After the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些邮件标头格式不正确，它们可能导致损坏的电子邮件消息。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此任何邮件标头中可以使用属性上设置的标头集合类仅应设置为使用类属性或作为参数传递时初始化对象。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 不应使用添加以下邮件标头列表属性，并且任何值设置为使用这些标头属性将被放弃或覆盖发送消息时：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - 密件抄送Bcc - CcCc - 内容 IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - FromFrom - 重要性Importance - MIME 版本MIME-Version - 优先级Priority - 回复Reply-To - 发件人Sender - 到To - X 优先级X-Priority 如果应用程序未指定标头使用 X 发件人属性，类发送消息时将创建一个。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 可以将发件人、 收件人、 主题和电子邮件的正文指定为参数时用来初始化对象。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 这些参数还可以设置或在使用属性访问对象。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 可能使用的以下属性将设置主邮件消息标头和消息元素类。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |邮件标头或部分Mail header or part|PropertyProperty| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件抄送 (BCC)Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |副本 (CC)Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |编码为自定义标头Encoding for custom headers|| |消息正文Message body|| |优先级Priority|| |接收方Recipient|| |回复Reply-To|| |发件人Sender|| |SubjectSubject|| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示一封电子邮件的标头。The following code example demonstrates displaying the headers for a mail message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ HeadersEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };
member this.HeadersEncoding : System.Text.Encoding with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此电子邮件的用户自定义标头使用的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used for the user-defined custom headers for this email message.

value.span: 用于用户定义此电子邮件的自定义标头的编码。

span.span: The encoding used for user-defined custom headers for this email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性的默认值为。The value of the property defaults to . SMTP 消息由标头和正文部分组成。SMTP messages consist of headers and body parts. SMTP IETF Rfc 限制的标头和正文部分组成的名称为 ASCII。The IETF RFCs for SMTP restrict the header and body part names to be ASCII. 但是，IETF Rfc 允许标头和正文部分的值为包含 Unicode 字符。However, the IETF RFCs allow header and body part values to contain Unicode characters. 在任何特定值，如果存在非 ASCII 字符，然后对该值进行编码结合使用的字符编码 （UTF8 或 Shift JIS，例如） 后跟字节编码 (或例如)。In any particular value, if non-ASCII characters exist, then the value is encoded using a combination of character encoding (UTF8 or Shift-JIS, for example) followed by byte encoding ( or for example). 结果通常是仅包含 ASCII 字符位于网络传输流。The result is usually that only ASCII characters are in the network transmission stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定的电子邮件收件人行上的地址。The property is used to designate the addresses on the To line of an email message. 若要添加到电子邮件的收件人，请创建收件人的地址，以及然后将该对象添加到此属性返回的集合。To add a recipient to an email message, create a for the recipient's address, and then add that object to the collection returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#7)]
